description:
Vice President Biden announced today in the White House Rose Garden that he will not be joining the race for President of the United States, citing the struggle his family underwent in losing his son and the timeline for launching a successful campaign. In a heartfelt speech, Biden said he would have liked to be "the President who cured cancer," and said he will continue to push for a cure. (footage courtesy of the White House, produced by Natalie Fertig / McClatchy) …
Click to Continue »
title: Vice President Joe Biden announces he is not running for President
